parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets relative screen X for ListNBox control columns positions. Setter for [[lnbGetColumnsPosition]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[lnbSetColumnsPos]] [idc, positions]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] - idc of the control

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> positions: [[Array]] - positions of the columns

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> ctrl [[lnbSetColumnsPos]] positions

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]] - lnb control

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> positions: [[Array]] - positions of the columns

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lnbSetColumnsPos]] [101, [0.1,0.5,0.7]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[lnbSetColumnsPos]] [0.1,0.5,0.7];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lnbAddArray]], [[lnbAddColumn]], [[lnbAddRow]], [[lnbClear]], [[lnbColor]], [[lnbCurSelRow]], [[lnbData]], [[lnbDeleteColumn]], [[lnbDeleteRow]], [[lnbGetColumnsPosition]], [[lnbPicture]], [[lnbSetColor]], [[lnbSetCurSelRow]], [[lnbSetData]], [[lnbSetPicture]], [[lnbSetText]], [[lnbSetValue]], [[lnbSize]], [[lnbText]], [[lnbValue]]
</value></part></template>
